title: Eco-Chic Loft with Garden in Artistic Nowy Sacz Suburb
description: Step into a bright, modern loft spanning 98 square meters, thoughtfully designed for today's eco-conscious lifestyle. This unique property offers an open-concept living area accented by underfloor heating and automated features. Both bedrooms are generously sized, including one with an en-suite bathroom. Floor-to-ceiling windows invite natural light and lead out to your own private garden space.
neighborhood_description: Nestled in the tranquil Suburb neighborhood of Nowy Sacz, this area is ideal for those seeking a peaceful retreat with easy highway access. The Suburb is known for its creative community, local art corners, and proximity to independent boutiques, cozy cafes, and shopping destinations. Vibrant yet unhurried, it’s a gem for students and young creatives eager to connect and explore.
lifestyle_benefits: peaceful green environment ideal for relaxation and study
convenient access to shopping and dining spots
target_buyer: Ideal for students or young professionals who value sustainability, personal space, and a strong sense of creative community.
market_positioning: Offering rare modern loft living in Nowy Sacz's green outskirts, this property stands out with environmental features and premium security, perfectly positioned for buyers seeking a move-in ready home that blends countryside serenity with contemporary style.
